REAUTHORIZE.TITLE: Can uy quyen lai
REAUTHORIZE.DESCRIPTION: Ket noi WhatsApp cua ban da het han. Vui long ket noi lai de tiep tuc nhan va gui tin nhan.
REAUTHORIZE.SUCCESS: WhatsApp da ket noi lai thanh cong
REAUTHORIZE.ERROR: Khong the ket noi lai WhatsApp. Vui long thu lai.
REAUTHORIZE.WHATSAPP_APP_ID_MISSING: WhatsApp App ID chua duoc cau hinh. Vui long lien he quan tri vien.
REAUTHORIZE.WHATSAPP_CONFIG_ID_MISSING: WhatsApp Configuration ID chua duoc cau hinh. Vui long lien he quan tri vien.
REAUTHORIZE.CONFIGURATION_ERROR: Loi cau hinh xay ra trong qua trinh uy quyen lai.
REAUTHORIZE.FACEBOOK_LOAD_ERROR: Khong the tai Facebook SDK. Vui long thu lai.
